00036 #include <vector>
00037 
00040 class MessageField
00041     {
00042     public:
00043         MessageField(const char* fieldname, VariantData* vdata)
00044             {
00045             this->name = (fieldname != NULL) ? fieldname : "";
00046             this->value = vdata;
00047             }
00048         ~MessageField()
00049             {
00050             if(value != NULL)
00051                 delete value;
00052             }
00053     std::string name;   
00054     VariantData* value; 
00055     };
00056 
00057 
00060 class EOSMessage
00061     {
00062     public:
00064         EOSMessage(const char* messageClass);
00066         ~EOSMessage();
00067         //
00069         void addValue(const char* valueKey, bool valueData);
00071         void addValue(const char* valueKey, double valueData);
00073         void addValue(const char* valueKey, const char* valueData);
00074         //
00076         void toLuaMessageBoardTable(lua_State* luaRuntime);
00077         //
00079         void setSender  (const char* sender)   { this->senderName = (sender != NULL) ? sender : ""; }
00081         void setReceiver(const char* receiver) { this->receiverName = (receiver != NULL) ? receiver : ""; }
00083         std::string& getSender()   { return this->senderName; }
00085         std::string& getReceiver() { return this->receiverName; }
00086         //
00087     private:
00088         std::vector<MessageField*> values; 
00089         std::string senderName;            
00090         std::string receiverName;          
00091     };
